channel.title: On the path to better, improvement stems from two forces
channel.description:
From: http://telegram.me/nemosharing
This is question that every entrepreneur should ask him/herself about scaling. I think that just asking yourself this question from time to time can help.
“Grow bigger” is the accepted measure of success. But is it success? Scale has the potential to squeeze the goodness out of a special experience, a service you love, or a product that brings exceptional quality to your life.
“Should You Scale?” https://medium.com/the-mission/should-you-scale-6463c26bab83
